long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Devtools for debugging application's state changes and emitted events.
The extension allows you to speed up your work on an application based on the Eventrix library. Thanks to the extension, you can view the history of events in your application and quickly detect places that require optimization.

Features:
- preview of the current state of the application
- state change statistics (number of modifications of a specific state)
- application state change history
- history of emitted events in the application
- statistics of emitted events in the application (number of specific events emitted)
- emit event with payload

See the official opensource repository for more details:
https://github.com/rstgroup/eventrix-devtools
